Title: Bing Image Creator adds GPT-4o alongside DALL-E3 for even more free ways to create
EnhancedContent:
Skip to content

Since the launch of Bing Image Creator in March 2023, we’ve loved seeing everything you’ve created and shared. We’re constantly evolving Bing Image Creator based on your feedback, and this update is all about giving you more choice and creativity than ever before.

**We’re thrilled to share that Bing Image Creator now includes the latest GPT-4o image generation model – for free.** This upgrade delivers you even more intelligence, flexibility, and options; GPT-4o joins the existing DALL-E3 model many of you know and love so you can turn your ideas into stunning visuals with greater ease, confidence, and control.

Finding what you need is just the beginning. Bing, as your AI-powered search and answer engine, gives you the freedom to *create* exactly what you’re looking for.

To get started creating with GPT-4o, visit [bing.com/create](https://www.bing.com/create), open the Bing app, create directly in Copilot Search, or type directly in your Bing search bar or Edge address bar.\*\*

**Bing Image Creator, now with GPT-4o**

In 2023, Bing Image Creator brought the power of AI image generation to everyone, for free. It’s always been our mission to give you the tools to satisfy your curiosity.

That’s why starting today Bing Image Creator offers you the choice of two models to fit your needs: GPT-4o and DALL-E3. GPT-4o delivers a major leap in image generation quality, bringing users an upgraded experience with more creative and photorealistic visuals as well as a deeper understanding of detailed prompts – including improved rendering of text and fine details. Whether you’re crafting a mood board, visualizing a product idea, or simply exploring your imagination, GPT-4o brings your vision to life with richer image generation.

![image of a bee generated by gpt-4o model in bing image creator](/getmedia/b3f86faa-e5a9-48d2-9a0d-41dbbc0f1053/Picture8.png)

We recognize that creativity is nothing without freedom. That’s why now, with just a click, you can switch models to DALL-E3 to not only get quick AI image generation, but also more options to choose from – all with the same look and feel you’ve been accustomed to from Bing Image Creator.

![image of a bee generated by DALLE3 model in bing image creator](/getmedia/0c6b8b8f-ae19-4f72-b566-a16d3e862022/Picture9.png)

![mobile experience of selecting a model for bing image creator](/getmedia/5c90ae93-7e06-4dbb-8b19-6cc078e7b44d/Mobile-(1).png?width=300&height=652)

Bing Image Creator is available on all platforms world-wide,\*\*\* including [bing.com/create](https://www.bing.com/create) and within Copilot Search.

![Bing image creation in Copilot search](/getmedia/176e54ac-ed3b-4d96-a229-84fa13706c8f/BVCblog4.png)

![Bing image creation in Copilot search](/getmedia/489d504e-1d16-458b-8fd2-642059bb0762/BVCblog5.png)

Bing Image Creator remains free to use with 15 fast creations available.\*

**Let your imagination run wild**

We can’t wait to see what you create. To kickstart your imagination, check out two of our favorite examples below:

![large koi fish image generated by Bing image creator](/getmedia/6df1bb76-8286-4ae9-a4e7-e13995eba2db/Picture12.png)*Prompt: A large koi fish swimming through the clouds with lanterns floating around and a crescent moon in the background – in dreamy pastel tones, realistic*

![moon phases poster generated by bing image creator](/getmedia/dbc901d3-792d-45d9-ab59-1241254bee70/Picture13.png)*Prompt: A beautiful, square, detailed, elegant, modern, scientific infographic titled “Phases of the Moon,” with illustrations for each phase, and a starry background*

**Try it today**

Ready to create something amazing? Head to [bing.com/create](https://www.bing.com/images/create), open the Bing app, create directly in Copilot Search, or type directly in your Bing search bar or Edge address bar\*\* to try Bing Image Creator.

\*15 daily fast creations. Thereafter, fast creations will require 10 Rewards points per creation. Standard speed creations are unlimited.

\*\*Bing as default search engine required

\*\*\*Except Russia and China
